description:
As the other members of WUG work hard on their own projects, Mayu finally receives a job offer for a drama.
Not only that, but she`ll be co-starring with Iwasaki Shiho, which is sure to garner attention.
When Ayumi and her friends come to Tokyo after seeing an ad for extras, they`re finally able to meet their idols Mayu and Shiho...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Si c`est bon, c`est miaou bon !
When It`s Tasty, It`s Tasty, Meow!
美味しい時はうんめーにゃー!
